price: ቅርቢቱን ሕይወትና ጌጧን የሚሹ የሆኑትን ሰዎች ሥራዎቻቸውን (ምንዳዋን) በእርሷ ውስጥ ወደነሱ እንሞላላቸዋለን፡፡ እነሱም በርሷ ውስጥ ምንም አይጎድልባቸውም፤
arabic: مَن كَانَ يُرِيدُ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَزِينَتَهَا نُوَفِّ إِلَيۡهِمۡ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ فِيهَا وَهُمۡ فِيهَا لَا يُبۡخَسُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: man kāna yurīdu al-ḥayata al-dun'yā wazīnatahā nuwaffi ilayhim aʿmālahum fīhā wahum fīhā lā yub'khasūna
